languages.text: Помимо {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}корпуса{/g} у корабля есть компоненты — оружие, двигатели и другие части судна. Большинство компонентов можно заменить на подобные, имеющиеся в наличии. Замена производится в любое время вне боя.

In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, a voidship has a number of components such as weapons, engines, and other ship parts. Most components can be replaced with ones of the same type, should you happen to procure them. You can make such replacements at any time outside combat.
languages.original_text: Помимо {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}корпуса{/g} у корабля есть компоненты — оружие, двигатели и другие части судна. Большинство компонентов можно заменить на подобные, имеющиеся в наличии. Замена производится в любое время вне боя.

traits.locale_text: In addition to the hull, a voidship has a number of components such as weapons, engines, and other parts of a vessel. Most components can be replaced with ones of the same type, should you happen to procure them. You can make such replacements at any time outside combat.

In addition to the hull, a voidship has a number of components such as weapons, engines, and other parts of a vessel. Most components can be replaced with ones of the same type, should you happen to procure them. You can make such replacements at any time outside combat.

In addition to the hull, a voidship has a number of components such as weapons, engines, and other ship parts. Most components can be replaced with ones of the same type, should you happen to procure them. You can make such replacements at any time outside combat.

In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, a voidship has a number of components such as weapons, engines, and other ship parts. Most components can be replaced with ones of the same type, should you happen to procure them. You can make such replacements at any time outside combat.

languages.text: Zusätzlich zum {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpf{/g} hat ein Raumschiff eine Anzahl an Komponenten wie Waffen, Motoren und andere Schiffsteile. Die meisten Komponenten können durch andere desselben Typs ersetzt werden, sofern du sie auftreiben kannst. Du kannst derlei Ersatz jederzeit außerhalb von Kämpfen durchführen.
languages.original_text: In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, a voidship has a number of components such as weapons, engines, and other ship parts. Most components can be replaced with ones of the same type, should you happen to procure them. You can make such replacements at any time outside combat.

traits.locale_text: Zusätzlich zum {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpf{/g} hat ein Raumschiff eine Anzahl an Komponenten wie Waffen, Motoren und andere Schiffsteile. Die meisten Komponenten können durch andere desselben Typs ersetzt werden, sofern du sie auftreiben kannst. Du kannst derlei Ersatz jederzeit außerhalb von Kämpfen durchführen.

languages.text: En plus de la {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}coque{/g}, un vaisseau spatial compte un certain nombre de composants tels que des armes, des moteurs et d'autres éléments. La plupart des composants peuvent être remplacés par des composants du même type, sous réserve de disponibilité. Vous pouvez procéder à ces remplacements à tout moment en dehors du combat.
languages.original_text: In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, a voidship has a number of components such as weapons, engines, and other ship parts. Most components can be replaced with ones of the same type, should you happen to procure them. You can make such replacements at any time outside combat.

traits.locale_text: En plus de la {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}coque{/g}, un vaisseau spatial compte un certain nombre de composants tels que des armes, des moteurs et d'autres éléments. La plupart des composants peuvent être remplacés par des composants du même type, sous réserve de disponibilité. Vous pouvez procéder à ces remplacements à tout moment en dehors du combat.

languages.text: 除了{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体{/g}之外，您的虚空舰还有很多组件，如武器、发动机与其他组件等。绝大多数组件都可以用相同类型的组件替换。因此，如果您得到了更强力的组件，不妨考虑强化您的舰船。您可以在战斗外的任何时间替换舰船组件。
languages.original_text: In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, a voidship has a number of components such as weapons, engines, and other ship parts. Most components can be replaced with ones of the same type, should you happen to procure them. You can make such replacements at any time outside combat.

traits.locale_text: 除了{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体{/g}之外，您的虚空舰还有很多组件，如武器、发动机与其他组件等。绝大多数组件都可以用相同类型的的组件替换。因此，如果您得到了更强力的组件，不妨考虑强化您的舰船。您可以在战斗外的任何时间替换舰船组件。

languages.text: Además del {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}casco{/g}, las naves del vacío presentan varios componentes, como armas, motores y otras piezas de nave. Casi todos los componentes se pueden reemplazar por otros del mismo tipo, en caso de que cuentes con ellos. Puedes efectuar dicho reemplazo siempre que no estés combatiendo.
languages.original_text: In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, a voidship has a number of components such as weapons, engines, and other ship parts. Most components can be replaced with ones of the same type, should you happen to procure them. You can make such replacements at any time outside combat.

traits.locale_text: Además del {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}casco{/g}, las naves del vacío presentan varios componentes, como armas, motores y otras piezas de nave. Casi todos los componentes se pueden reemplazar por otros del mismo tipo, en caso de que cuentes con ellos. Puedes efectuar dicho reemplazo siempre que no estés combatiendo.

languages.original_text: In addition to the hull, the ship has components — weapons, engines and other parts of the ship. Most of the components can be replaced with similar ones that are available. Replacements can be made at any time outside of combat.

languages.text: ヴォイドシップは{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体{/g}の他に、武器、エンジン、およびその他の船のパーツ等多くの部品で構成されている。もし購入する機会があれば、ほとんどの部品はそれと同じタイプのものと交換可能である。戦闘時以外であればいつでも部品交換することができる。
languages.original_text: In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, a voidship has a number of components such as weapons, engines, and other ship parts. Most components can be replaced with ones of the same type, should you happen to procure them. You can make such replacements at any time outside combat.

traits.locale_text: ヴォイドシップは{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体{/g}の他に、武器、エンジン、およびその他の船のパーツ等多くの部品で構成されている。もし購入する機会があれば、ほとんどの部品はそれと同じタイプのものと交換可能である。戦闘時以外であればいつでも部品交換することができる。
